item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Hi! I am a first year PhD student in Finance and Economics at Columbia Business School. I am interested in exploring research questions at the intersection of Finance and Computer Science. Previously, I was a research fellow at Adobe Research, Bangalore where I worked on research projects in Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Data Mining and Marketing. I graduated from Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kanpur in 2016. At IIT Kanpur, I worked on research projects in Machine Learning, Algorithmic Game Theory and Program Analysis.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: IIT Kanpur ESC101: Fundamentals of Computing (Fall 2015 and Spring 2016) Worked with faculty instructors - Professor Nitin Saxena (Fall) and Professor Sunil Simon (Spring) for the core institute course, ESC101 Fundamentals of Computing. Responsibilities included: Supervised weekly tutorials and problem solving sessions Assisted the instructors in designing course material, quizzes, labs and exams
